name: tree-view-auto-collapse
description: Helps to keep the tree view clean and clear by collapsing currently unused entries.
author: Pawe≈Ç Golonko <pgolonko@gmail.com> (http://greenek.com/)

keepExpanded.title: Keep Expanded
keepExpanded.description: List of glob patterns. Directories matching these patterns will be prevented from auto-collapsing.

triggerOnTextEditorClose.title: Auto-Collapse on Editor Tab Closing
triggerOnTextEditorClose.description: Perform auto-collapse after closing a text editor tab.
